organisation_name: Féderation INternationale des fabricants et transformateurs d'Adhésifs et Thermocollants sur papiers et autres supports (FINAT)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: CheMI platform, CITPA, ERPC, L9, ESVOC, Industry Cross-Sector Group for Food Contact Materials
goals__remit:
FINAT is the European association for the self-adhesive label industry. It also covers adjacent narrow-web product decoration and identification technologies. 
 
SCOPE AND FUNCTIONS 
 
-Providing a networking platform for converters, suppliers and indirect suppliers 
-Represent members' interests 
-Provide a central source for industry information 
-Offer education and technical publications 
-Represent the industry's views at EU level 
-Establish and maintain industry-related best practices, standards and test methods 
-Offer a global communication platform for regional and national associations world-wide
relevant_communication: Working on BREF STS input from industry, participating in European Recovered Paper Council and promoting recycling of release liner material, working to produce EU information document on food contact for label industry, submitting request for tariff harmonization
